description:
Big enough to deal with pesky blister packs and make a great marshmallow roasting stick, but small enough to pop on your key ring. At only 8cm and weighing less than most energy bars, the Shuffle packs functionality into a small package.

  • 8Cr14MoV blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • BlackWash finish improves corrosion resistance of the high-carbon steel and hides wear well
  • Bottle opener
  • Lanyard hole has profiled edge that doubles as a flat head screwdriver
  • Deep finger grooves for secure grip
  • Glass reinforced nylon grip panels are light and strong
  • Grippy glass reinforced nylon handles
  • Liner-lock design keeps fingers safe when using the knife
  • Deep-carry pocket clip is designed for right handed tip-up carry
name: Kershaw Shuffle Blackwash Knife - Unisex
